name: Central Park New York Hidden Object Puzzle Games
name_original: Central Park New York Hidden Object Puzzle Games
description:
Hidden Objects – Central Park New York is a beautifully designed Seek & Find game with 30+ levels! 100’s of Objects to Find!

Explore New York City’s Central Park finding famous Fountains, ornate Bridges, Statues, gorgeous Gardens and more searching for Hidden Objects! See all the Seasons in Central Park - Winter, Spring, Summer & Fall!

Discover the excitement of this World Famous Urban City’s Park without leaving your home. Find New York City themed objects like yellow cabs, NYC sports figures, pizza and more.

Levels vary from easy to difficult. A fun, object quest challenge for Hidden Object, Puzzle, Seek & Find, Spot the Difference, Brain & Word fans!

This Brain Challenging Adventure is sure to entertain!

Hidden Objects – Central Park New York features:
Gorgeous, Crisp Graphics of NYC
3 Game Modes- Traditional, Chill, Adventure
Exciting Levels/Scenes of Hidden Object Puzzles
Artistically Crafted Levels
Zoom to Find Objects
Find Objects by Picture, Word, or Collector
Challenge Scenes with Missing Letters, Scrambled Words and Bonus Objects
Timed Challenges and Hints

Game Modes instructions:
TRADITIONAL-
Time limits
Hint limits
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

CHILL-
Time unlimited
Hints unlimited
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

ADVENTURE-
Time limits
Hint limits
Bonus Bonanza (words highlighted in green)
Missing Letters, Scrambled Words, Word Finder
15 Unique Levels
